mdRecord.dcterms:title: Le maire de Paris, allant au palais, poser les scélés sur les papiers du Parlement
The mayor of Paris, going to the palace, to put seals on the papers of Parliament
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Lines of soldier stand in formation outside of a palace as officials in robes enter through the gate
